alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Floyd; Gordon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Floyd, central Gordon and north central Bartow Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Oostanaula, or near Calhoun, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Calhoun, Adairsville, Resaca, Sonoraville, Oostanaula, Sugar Valley, Folsom and Everett Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northwestern Georgia.
